subtitle: Carob is sometimes used as an alternative for chocolate.

method.text: Sift together the flour, baking powder, salt and nutmeg.
Cream butter and sugar together until thick and pale. Add the egg and banana to bowl. Mix well.
Gradually fold the flour into the mixture with the milk and vanilla essence. Finally, gently stir the carob in to give it a marbled effect.
Preheat oven to 180°C. Lightly grease a 900 g lined loaf tin.
Spoon mixture into loaf tin and bake for 1 hr - 1hr 15 min or until lightly browned - a skewer, when inserted, should come out clean.
Leave to cool on a wire rack. Serve in slices.

title: Banana and carob loaf
